item.title: ~~ Fawki's Lumbridge Swamp Miner v 0.63 ~~
item.dc:creator: @PyRo1 PyRo.
item.description:
@PyRo1 wrote:

//                    [RS2] Lumbridge Swamp Miner.
//
//            Uses first draft of Standard Resource Library. [SRL]
//
//                              v 0.63.
//
//              Please do not spread this script around.
//                It is for evaluation purposes only.
//         You are free however to use it for private purposes :P
//
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
//
//                        by WT-Fakawi (Fawki)
//                    contact: WTFakawi@hotmail.com
//
//
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
//
//   This Script will mine any ore at Lumbridge Swamp and bank at Draynor.
//
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
//                           Instructions.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
//
// 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright.
// 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.
// 3. Set Playernames, Passwords and MaxPlayers in DeclarePlayers.
// 4. Position your chars at Draynor bank Southmost bankslot.
// 5. If script cant find colors align MM North as much as possible.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------



program LumbridgeMiner;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/DraynorColorFinder.scar}



var DB1,DB2,DB3,TotalOres,TheOre,OreWait,Gas:integer;

var RotateTime: LongInt;

var Switch:Boolean;

//******************** Set These Constants if Needed  **********************//

const StartPlayer         = 0;

Const MaxWait             = 10;     // Ore click interval. In seconds.
Const Loads               = 1;     // Number of loads before switching Player.
Const FawkiDebug          = False;  // Debug.

Const CoalOre              = 2438711;   // CoalOre is a constant
Const MithrilOre           = 7425100;   // Mithril is a constant
Const AdamantOre           = 4873288;   // Adamant is a constant
//**********************RuneScape Constants**********************************//

Const MSGasColor1          = 8101281;   // New gas color.
Const MSGasColor2          = 9218480;   // New gas color.
//Const MSGasColor3          = 6392713;   // New gas color.
Const MSGasColor3          = 9283761;   // New gas color.

//*************************************************************************//
Const VersionNumber       = '0.63';
//*************************************************************************//

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
     HowManyPlayers:=5;

     NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

     Players[0].Name :='';
     Players[0].Pass :='';
     Players[0].Nick :='';
     Players[0].Skill:= 'coal';
     Players[0].Loc  :='Draynor';
     Players[0].Active:=True;

     Players[1].Name :='';   // 30
     Players[1].Pass :='';
     Players[1].Skill:= 'mithril';
     Players[1].Nick :='';
     Players[1].Loc  :='Draynor';
     Players[1].Active:=True;

     Players[2].Name :='';
     Players[2].Pass :='';
     Players[2].Nick :='';
     Players[2].Skill:= 'adamant';
     Players[2].Loc  :='Draynor';
     Players[2].Active:=True;
     
     Players[3].Name :='';
     Players[3].Pass :='';
     Players[3].Nick :='';
     Players[3].Skill:= 'coal';
     Players[3].Loc  :='Draynor';
     Players[3].Active:=True;
     
     Players[4].Name :='';
     Players[4].Pass :='';
     Players[4].Nick :='';
     Players[4].Skill:= 'coal';
     Players[4].Loc  :='Draynor';
     Players[4].Active:=True;

end;

//*************************************************************************//

procedure PlayerStats;

var Active: string;
var i: Integer;
begin
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn(' ');
writeln('**********************************************');
writeln('Name         : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Name);
writeln('Number       : '+inttostr(CurrentPlayer));
writeln('Mining Level : '+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].level[15]));
writeln('Worked for   : '+IntToStr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Worked)+' minutes.');
writeln('Banked       : '+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked) + ' times.');
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Active=True then Active:='True' else Active:='False';
writeln('Active       : '+ Active);
writeln('Location     : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].loc);
writeln('**********************************************');

for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers-1 do
   begin
   if Players[i].Active=True then Active:='True' else Active:='False';
      writeln( (inttostr(i))+' : '+Players[i].name+ ' = '+Active+'. - Lvl : '+inttostr(Players[i].level[15])+
      '. - B :'+inttostr(Players[i].Banked)+' Times.'+
      ' -  : '+IntToStr(Players[i].Worked)+' mins.'+' - Loc: '+Players[i].loc);
    end
   writeln('**********************************************');
end;

//*************************************************************************//

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn('<============== -'+VersionNumber+'- Progress Report ===============>');
  writeln('Worked for '+ TimeRunning);
  WriteLn('Banked '+IntToStr(banks)+' loads[s].');
  WriteLn('Banked '+IntToStr(TotalOres)+' Ores.');
  WriteLn('Avooided Gas '+IntToStr(Gas)+' Times.');

  WriteLn('Random Event Report:');
  if(logs>0)then WriteLn('  Logged in '+IntToStr(logs)+' Time[s].');
  WriteLn('<=====================================================>');
  PlayerStats;
end;

//*************************************************************************//

Procedure FillMem;
begin
  DB1 := DTMFromString('78DA636C67626008664001FFFFFF67F80FA41' +
       '921ECFF8CB54035DEA86AFEFC61621081AA0101C63A4C73B0AA09' +
       'C7AF06000153117B');
  DB2 := DTMFromString('78DA63EC60626008624001FFFFFF67F80FA41' +
       '921ECFF8C3540353EA86AFEFC61621081AA0101C63AA09A1022D4' +
       '44E057030001B5117D');
  DB3 := DTMFromString('78DA63EC60626008624001FFFFFF67F80FA41' +
       '921ECFF8CF540359EA86AFEFC61621081AA0101C63AA09A40026A' +
       '6A816A42F1AB010000781176');
 end;


//*************************************************************************//

Procedure SetUp;
begin
     Fillmem;
     SetupSRL;
     SetupSRLMining;
     EquipPick:= False;  // Wielding.
     PickUpItems:=True; // to pick up random items when pickhead is gone.
     DeclarePlayers;
     CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer;
     LoginPlayer;
     SymbolAccuracy:=0.4;
     BenMouse:=False;
     MouseSpeed:=25;
     ClearDebug;
     ClearReport;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure RunAway;
begin
  SetRun(true);
  MouseFindFlag(648,35,1,-1);
  FFlag(10);
  wait(random(50)+8000+random(2000));
  MouseFindFlag(648,135,1,1);
  FFlag(10);
 case (Random(5)+1) of
  1: begin  TypeSend('bleh'); end;
  2: begin  TypeSend('=]'); end;
  3: begin  TypeSend('ghehe'); end;
  4: begin  TypeSend('dam'); end;
  5: begin  TypeSend('sigh'); end;
  end;

end;


//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
  FindNormalRandoms;
  if FindFight then
   begin
      PerfectNorth;
      RunAway;
   end
  if(InBlack)then
   begin
     Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := 'InBlack';
     Logout;
    Exit;
   end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Function SimpleBank:Boolean;
var sx,sy,dx,dy,Mark2,Tries:integer;
begin
  SX:=MSCX-20; SY:=MSCY;
  repeat
  sx:=Sx-3;
  sy:=sy-10+Random(10);
    MMouse(sx, sy, 0, 0);
    if IsUpTextMulti('e Bank','Booth','ooth') then
    begin
      GetMousePos(Dx, Dy);
      Mouse(Dx, Dy, 0, 0, False);
      if ChooseOption(Dx, Dy, 'uickly')  then
      begin
        MarkTime(Mark2);
        repeat
          Wait(10);
          if TimeFromMark(Mark2) > 20000 then
           begin
             writeln('couldnt find the bank. Exiting');
             Exit;
           end;
        until BankScreen;
      end;
    Result := True;
    Exit;
    end;
  wait(1);
  Tries:=Tries+1;
  until(tries >6)
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Function WeAreInSwamp:Boolean;

begin
if FindSymbol(x,y,'mining site') then
   begin
     Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:='Swamp';
     result:=true;
   end
   else Result := False;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Procedure WalkToSwamp;
var XD,YD:integer;
begin

   writeln(Players[CurrentPlayer].name+' = '+Players[CurrentPlayer].loc);

   
   MarkTime(Mark);
   repeat
      if not(Loggedin) then break;
      if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
      RadialRoadWalk(RoadColor,90,210,55,-1,-1);
   until FindColor(x,y,WaterColor,690,115,691,116);

   MarkTime(Mark);
   Repeat
      if not(Loggedin) then break;
      if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>240000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
      FindRandoms;
      RadialWalk(WaterColor,350,550,50,0,-1);
   Until FindColor(XD,YD,WaterColor,700,36,701,37);

   RadialWalk(WaterColor,340,450,40,-1,1);

   MarkTime(Mark);
   Repeat
      if not(Loggedin) then break;
      if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>60000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
      FindRandoms;
      RadialWalk(WaterColor,90,0,45,1,1);
   Until FindColor(XD,YD,HouseColor,MMX1,MMY1,MMX2,MMY2);
//   Until FindColor(XD,YD,HouseColor,MMCX-30,MMCY-60,MMCX+30,MMCY+10);
   writeln('HouseColor Found');
   Symbolaccuracy:=0.2;

   MarkTime(Mark);
   Repeat
      if not(Loggedin) then break;
      if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>60000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
      Wait(1000);
      RadialWalk(WaterColor,340,540,45,1,1);
   Until FindSymbol(x,y,'mining site');
   Mouse(X,Y,0,0,True);
   Flag;
   Symbolaccuracy:=0.8;

   Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:='Swamp';

end;

//*************************************************************************//

Procedure WalkToDraynor;
var Mark3:integer;
begin

   MouseFindFlag(600,120,0,-2);  // 'blind' click'
   Flag;
  
   MarkTime(Mark3);
   repeat
      if not(Loggedin) then break;
      if(TimeFromMark(Mark3)>180000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
      FindRandoms;
      RadialWalk(WaterColor,370,90,67,1,0);
   until FindColor(x,y,BankColor,MMX1,MMY1,MMX2,MMY2);
   Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
   IdleTime(5000,1000,1.0);
   PerfectNorth;
   Flag;
   DTM3Flag(DB1,DB2,DB3,True);
   Flag;
   if not SimpleBank then OpenBankQuiet('db');
end;

//*************************************************************************//

procedure MyMine;
var  MineTime,I,J:integer;
begin

if Players[CurrentPlayer].skill = 'adamant' then J:=3;
if Players[CurrentPlayer].skill = 'mithril' then J:=2;
if Players[CurrentPlayer].skill = 'coal'    then J:=1;

  for I := 1 to J do
  begin
   case I of
   1: begin TheOre := CoalOre;    OreWait:=5;  end  // this loop always prefers adamant
   2: begin TheOre := MithrilOre; OreWait:=20; end  // over mithril over coal...
   3: begin TheOre := AdamantOre; OreWait:=40; end
  end

   if(FindObj(x,y,'Mine',TheOre,5))then
     begin
       if (not GasCheck(x,y)) then
       begin
         Mouse(x,y,5,0,true);
         if(FlagPresent)then
         begin
           FFlag(10);
           Wait(500+Random(500));
         end;
         MarkTime(MineTime);
         repeat
            if (not(Loggedin)) then  break;
            Wait(500+Random(500));
            FindRandoms;
            if GasCheck(x,y) then exit;
            if(not(FindPick))then NoPick:=true;
         until(not(GetColor(109,430)=0)and(not(GetColor(195,426)=0)))or
         (TimeFromMark(MineTime)>=OreWait*1000)
       end;
     end else
     wait(100);
   end
end;

//*************Copied From Stupid3ooo's Guildminer**************************//

procedure Bank;

var LocalOres:integer;
begin
    Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:='Draynor';
    if(NoPick=true) and (EquipPick=true) then
    begin
       if InventoryFull then
       begin
         if(FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(Ore,x,y,559,210,735,460,25))then
              begin
                Mouse(x,y,5,5,false);
                ChooseOption(x,y,'Drop');
              end;
         GameTab(5);
         Mouse(593,303,0,0,true);
         Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
         GameTab(4);
       end;
    end;

    LocalOres:=CountItemBmpTol(Ore,50);

    if not BankScreen then
    begin
      MarkTime(Mark);
      repeat
         if (not(Loggedin)) then  break;
         OpenBankQuiet('db');
      until(BankScreen or (TimeFromMark(Mark)>60000));
    end;

    if(BankScreen)then
    begin
      Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
      FixBank;
      if(NoPick=true)then
      begin
        ClickAllItemsColorWait('All',65536,1000+Random(100));
         Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
         Withdraw(1,1,1);
         Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
      end else
      begin
        if(EquipPick=false)then
          Deposit(2,28,2);
          Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
        if(EquipPick=true)then
           begin
             ClickAllItemsColorWait('All',65536,1000+Random(100));
             Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
           end;
      end;
      CloseWindow;
      if(NoPick=true)and(EquipPick=true)then
      begin
        FindPickHeadColor;
        Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
        ClickItemColor(hc1,true);
      end;
      Banks:=Banks+1;
      TotalOres:=TotalOres+LocalOres;
      Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked:=Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked+1;
      NoPick:=false
    end;
end;

//*************************************************************************//

procedure Rotate;
begin
    MarkTime(RotateTime);
    if switch then
       begin
          switch:=False;
          Face('E');
          SendArrowSilentWait(0,1000+Random(500));
          exit;
       end
    if not switch  then
       begin
          switch:=true;
          Face('N');
          SendArrowSilentWait(2,1000+Random(500));
          exit;
       end
end;

//*************************************************************************//
//
//                               Main EventLoop
//
//*************************************************************************//

begin

Setup;
wait(1000);
//PerfectNorth;
SymbolAccuracy:= 0.4;
FindDraynorColors;
SymbolAccuracy:= 0.8;

repeat

   PerfectNorth;
  
   SetChat('on',1);
   SetChat('off',2);
   SetChat('on',3);
   FixChat;
   SetChat('on',1);
   SetChat('on',3);

   FindPickHeadColor;
   WriteFileString(TheFile,chr(13)+UpperCase(Players[CurrentPlayer].Name) + chr(13));
   Players[CurrentPlayer].level[15]:=GetSkillLevel('mining');
   NickNameBMP:=CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick,UpChars)
   ProgressReport;
   Gametab(4);
   
   if (not FindColor(x,y,RoadColor,MMX1,MMY1,MMX2,MMY2)) then
      if (FindDraynorRoadColor(580,53,608,71) = 0) then
         RoadColorChecker;
   
   if Players[CurrentPlayer].loc='Draynor' then WalkToSwamp;

   If ((Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc='Swamp') and (Loggedin)) then
      begin
        SetRun(True);
        if Players[CurrentPlayer].Skill='mithril' then Face('E');
        MarkTime(Mark);
        MarkTime(RotateTime);
        Repeat
          MyMine;
          FindRandoms;
          if (not(Loggedin)) then  break;
          if (not( Players[CurrentPlayer].Skill='coal') ) then
            if (TimeFromMark(RotateTime))> 30000 then Rotate;
        Until(InventoryFull)or(NoPick=true)or(TimeFromMark(Mark)>900000) //  15 mins for full inventory
        SetRun(False);
        PerfectNorth;
        WalkToDraynor;
        Bank;
        FindRandoms;
        ProgressReport;
        PerfectNorth;
      end;
     
   if ( (Loggedin) and (Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked mod Loads = 0) ) then
      begin
          MarkTime(Mark);
          SetChat('off',1);
          repeat
             Wait(1000);
             FindRandoms;
             if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000) then begin Logout; Break; end;
          until(not(LoggedIn));
          NextPlayer(True);
      end;

   if (not (Loggedin)) then  NextPlayer(False);

until(False);

end.

Read full topic
